p: The WNV strain was isolated from a horse in Camargue (France) in 2000 [23]. After 4 passages on Vero cells, the WNV stock was produced on Ae. albopictus cells C6/36 [24]. The RVFV is the avirulent strain Clone 13 isolated from a human case in Bangui (Central African Republic) in 1974 [25]. After 8 passages on Vero cells, the RVFV stock was produced on C6/36 cells. Viral stocks were stored at −80°C in aliquots until use.
